summary: REQ-152 is well-implemented in Layout.tsx with all three banners displayed side-by-side, correct URLs, image sources, and dark theme styling. REQ-151 requires the actual image file to be saved at frontend/public/assets/generated/ebay-banner.dim_940x313.jpg, but no file was added in the diff (ADDED FILES: none), so this requirement is not fulfilled by the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Save the uploaded car photo (rear of a slammed orange Honda Civic) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/ebay-banner.dim_940x313.jpg.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files. The image asset frontend/public/assets/generated/ebay-banner.dim_940x313.jpg was not added in the diff, meaning the file does not exist and is not accessible from the frontend at that path.
